Strength.name: RAPID PUNCH
Strength.val: Launch a series of continuous punches | 1x/tick (Uncountable) | 20s CD

Strength.name: SERIOUS PUNCH
Strength.val: Throw an incredibly powerful punch that deals a large amount of damage. | 10x | 25s CD

Strength.name: TORNADO SMASH
Strength.val: Smash the ground with immense strength, dealing damage to a large area. | 10 | 20s CD

Strength.name: VIBRATION WAVE
Strength.val: Create an intense vibration that damages anyone in the way. | 13x | 20s CD

Durability.name: KINGS AURA
Durability.val: Cover's player's entire body in a mysterious power which reduces 10% of player damage taken by attacks. | N/A | 10s CD

Durability.name: SUPER HUMAN
Durability.val: Transform into Super Human mode reducing 15% of all player damage taken. | N/A | 10s CD

Durability.name: ARMORED COLOSSUS
Durability.val: Transform into an Armored Titan reducing 30% of all player damage taken and 4x punch damage for 30 seconds. | N/A | 60s CD

Durability.name: STAGE FOUR
Durability.val: Transform into Stage Four which reduces 35% of all player damage taken. By punching, you can activate the forms melee ability.| N/A | 10s CD

Durability.name: NINE TAILED MODE
Durability.val: Transform into Six Path Sage Mode and endure 40% damage received of all players MOST REQUIRED FOR PVP & PVE. | N/A | 10s CD

Chakra.name: SPIRAL SPHERE
Chakra.val: Create a deadly ball of wind that blasts enemies backwards Not required equipping. | 8x | 10s CD

Chakra.name: FIRE FIST
Chakra.val: A projectile that tracks down the closest player Required for PVP and PVE. | 10x | 15s CD

Chakra.name: ENERGY BEAM
Chakra.val: Generate a deadly beam of energy that deals continuous damage Not required for PVP. Good for PVE| 6x/tick | 20s CD

Chakra.name: SKELETON
Chakra.val: Form a large skeleton around your character, reducing 20% of all player damage taken. By punching, you can activate the skeleton's melee ability | N/A | 10s CD

Chakra.name: ICE BLAST
Chakra.val: Blast ice in front of you freezing players and dealing damage. Required for PVP due to Stun | 8x scaling | 20s CD

Chakra.name: SPIRIT EXPLOSION
Chakra.val: Form a huge energy ball and casting is to long. Not required for PVP | 15x scaling | 9s CD

Chakra.name: SPIRAL SHURIKEN
Chakra.val: Form a shuriken deals massive dmg and huge AoE. required for PVP & PVE | 25x scaling | 6-7s CD

Chakra.name: MULTIPLE BOMB SPIRAL SHURIKEN
Chakra.val: Form a multiple shuriken deals massive dmg and huge AoE. required for PVP & PVE | 20x scaling | 8s CD

Chakra.name: TAIL MONSTER BOMB
Chakra.val: Form a massive bomb deals massive dmg and huge AoE. required for PVP & PVE | 50x scaling | 3-5s CD

Sword.name: FLYING SLASH
Sword.val: Create a powerful slash of wind that flies towards enemies | 10x scaling | 10s CD

Sword.name: RAPID SLASH
Sword.val: Multiple slashes that deal continuous damage all players within range. | 8x/tick | 20s CD

Sword.name: DRAGON'S WRATH
Sword.val: A powerful charge attack that can cut through multiple enemies| 15x scaling | 25s CD

Speed.name: WATER RUNNING
Speed.val: Allows players to walk and run on water. | N/A | N/A

Agility.name: FLIGHT
Agility.val: Allows players to fly. | N/A | N/A

Agility.name: FLAME FLIGHT
Agility.val: Generates fire under player's hands that allows faster flight. | N/A

Agility.name: BLINK
Agility.val: Teleport in any direction within an area. Good for PVE and PVE| N/A | 5s CD
